headline: General Motors Taps Lucid Veteran To Steer EV And Software Shift
summary: General Motors (NYSE:GM) is accelerating plans for its next generation EV and software platforms. The company has appointed former Lucid executive Claudia Gast to lead strategy, corporate development, and technology partnerships. The move signals a renewed focus on EV technology, software architecture, and autonomous driving capabilities. For you as an investor, this update sits at the intersection of where autos and tech are increasingly overlapping. GM still generates much of its business...
